column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Worry weighs on Epiphron's mind.
/poke the hardworking observer.
Speak with Epiphron.
I hope she's all right... Oh, I want to go after her, but what if she comes back while I'm away?
Hm? You must be a familiar. Can you help me deliver a message?
I have an associate who works much too hard. I want to tell her to take a break and join me for a nice, relaxing meal.

I sent another familiar already, but it's failed to return... As an experimental entity, it is too simple to handle more than one order at a time, so it might be stuck attempting to fulfill my request.
Would you mind checking on them both for me? I can give you a little something if you're willing help out...?
Wonderful. Knowing my associate, she's probably dozing off somewhere around the trees to the north. This wouldn't happen if she'd get a good night's rest for once...
You might need to give her a <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>poke<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> to wake her up.
If my associate is nodding off, try giving her a <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>poke<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> to wake her up.

The observer is fast asleep, completely unresponsive to the familiar fussing over her. A good <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>poke<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> might wake her up.
Hmmhuh? <yawn> ...How long was I asleep?
Epiphron sent you? Just to invite me to eat? Why send a familiar for something so trivial?
Although, come to think of it, I <Emphasis>could</Emphasis> use a meal. Please let him know I'll be along soon.
...Wait, are you a familiar as well? I thought you were one of us for a moment! Anyway, thank you for waking me.
I suppose we'll be eating at our usual place. A nice cup of tea to start with sounds lovely... Well? Do you not also need to report to Epiphron?
Thank you for your help. My familiar says my associate has accepted my invitation. That is what happened, yes?
Good. That means it can carry out its duties on a basic level, at least.
I designed it to convey ideas through information-laden aether rather than words, so I'm happy to see the communication was successful.
It does seem, however, that this method is ineffective when the recipient of the message is asleep... I'll get to work on fixing that.
But not now. Enjoying some time with my associate is the priority at the moment. Thank you again for your help.
